description:
The overworked girls inform Boss Inugane that they`re too tired to perform. An influential enka singer insults the Gokudols during a live radio show.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Roudousha yo, Danketsu Seyo! / Taiketsu Babaa / Pidgeon / Honesty / Fuufu Zenzai / 5 Nin no Akuma
労働者よ, 団結せよ! / 対決ババア / ピジョン / Honesty / 夫婦善哉 / 5人の悪魔
